author: vgadde.eth
content: Hello everyone a question regarding locked eth ... After Ethereum moves to POS will the locked ethereum be accessible or we have to wait until shard chains ?

author: protolambda
content: <@!315530255446179840> Withdrawals likely go into some fork in-between those events. Withdrawals are a complex mechanism that needs additional testing, review, etc. and thus not part of the Merge upgrade if we take the fastest route to proof of stake.

author: m.kalinin
content: Withdrawals require simultaneous upgrade of consensus and execution layers which increases the complexity

content: WAG, do we have an estimate on the withdrawal timeframe post-merge? 1 month? 1 quarter? 1 half? etc.. I do believe it will help folks to grasp the window when they could exit being a valdiator (and get their ETH back) and counterintuitively, the moment that we allow for withdraws, I am convinced the deposit contract will spike with new deposits..
